response.original_title: THE PASSING OF A TYNE FERRY
response.overview: An amateur film made by South Shields-born filmmaker Lilian Wincote recording the final day of the Shields Ferry ‘Northumbrian’ on the 25th April 1972. The film shows the steam ferry crossing between North and South Shields collecting and transporting passengers and vehicles.
response.title: THE PASSING OF A TYNE FERRY
